trans-unit.source: Enables you to create limit items for unplanned services or materials.

seg-source.mrk: Enables you to create limit items for unplanned services or materials.

target.mrk: 您可針對未計劃服務或物料建立限制項目。

trans-unit.source: You can create limit items for unplanned services or for unplanned materials, that is, services or materials that cannot be specified in detail at the time of ordering. In both cases, you define an expected value, an overall limit and a period of time:

seg-source.mrk: You can create limit items for unplanned services or for unplanned materials, that is, services or materials that cannot be specified in detail at the time of ordering.
In both cases, you define an expected value, an overall limit and a period of time:

target.mrk: 您可針對未計劃服務或未計劃物料 (意即無法在訂購時詳細指定的服務或物料) 建立限制項目。
在上述兩種情況中，您可定義期望值、整體限制和期間：

trans-unit.source: Limit for materials: Select <uicontrol>Product Type Group</uicontrol><cite>Material (1)</cite>

target.mrk: 選擇 <uicontrol>[產品類型群組]</uicontrol> <cite>物料 (1)</cite>

trans-unit.source: In case of a limit item for materials, a goods receipt is not possible. The invoice is posted directly with reference to the purchase order, provided that the specified value limit is not exceeded.

seg-source.mrk: In case of a limit item for materials, a goods receipt is not possible.
The invoice is posted directly with reference to the purchase order, provided that the specified value limit is not exceeded.

target.mrk: 若物料為限制項目，則無法進行收貨。
若未超過指定值限制，則會直接過帳採購單相關發票。

trans-unit.source: Limit for lean services: Select <uicontrol>Product Type Group</uicontrol><cite>Service (2)</cite>

target.mrk: 選擇 <uicontrol>[產品類型群組]</uicontrol> <cite>服務 (2)</cite>

trans-unit.source: In case of a limit item for services, a service entry sheet <emphasis>can</emphasis> be created if required. It is also possible to post an invoice immediately.

seg-source.mrk: In case of a limit item for services, a service entry sheet <emphasis>can</emphasis> be created if required.
It is also possible to post an invoice immediately.

target.mrk: 若服務為限制項目，則您<emphasis>可</emphasis>視需要建立服務輸入表，

trans-unit.source: If you record the performed services and their price and quantity using the <uicontrol>Manage Service Entry Sheets - Lean Services</uicontrol> app, the system displays the <uicontrol>Expected Value</uicontrol> of the limit item in the service entry sheet and reports an error if the stated amount exceeds the <uicontrol>Overall Limit</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: If you record the performed services and their price and quantity using the <uicontrol>Manage Service Entry Sheets - Lean Services</uicontrol> app, the system displays the <uicontrol>Expected Value</uicontrol> of the limit item in the service entry sheet and reports an error if the stated amount exceeds the <uicontrol>Overall Limit</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 若您使用 <uicontrol>[管理服務輸入表 - 精簡服務]</uicontrol> 應用程式記錄執行的服務、其價格和數量，系統會在服務輸入表中顯示限制項目的 <uicontrol>[期望值]</uicontrol>，並於指定金額超過 <uicontrol>[整體限制]</uicontrol> 時呈報錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When creating a purchase order with limit items (item category E), the account assignment categories C, K, P, S, N, A, F, and U are currently supported.

seg-source.mrk: When creating a purchase order with limit items (item category E), the account assignment categories C, K, P, S, N, A, F, and U are currently supported.

target.mrk: 使用限制項目 (項目種類 E) 建立採購單時，科目指派種類 C、K、P、S、N、A、F 和 U 目前會進行支援。

trans-unit.source: You can view purchase order confirmations for limit items on the confirmation tab of the item.

seg-source.mrk: You can view purchase order confirmations for limit items on the confirmation tab of the item.

target.mrk: 您可在項目的確認標籤上檢視限制項目的採購單確認。
